data.event: Windsor (2011 population: 3,785) is a Canadian town located in Hants County, Nova Scotia.

event.title: was raided by New England forces in 1704

data.event: When the Acadians lived in the area, the town was raided by New England forces in 1704.

event.title: Situated at the junction of the Avon and St. Croix Rivers, it is the largest community in the District of the Municipality of West Hants and had a 2001

data.event: Situated at the junction of the Avon and St. Croix Rivers, it is the largest community in the District of the Municipality of West Hants and had a 2001 population of 3,779 residents.
